summary: CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON. TOOK IT TO MY MECHANIC TO TROUBLE-SHOOT. HE INDICATED IT WAS A TRANSMISSION PROBLEM AND RECOMMENDED A TRANSMISSION SPECIALIST. THE TRANSMISSION SPECIALIST HAD THE CAR FOR 2 DAYS AND FINALLY REFUSED TO WORK ON IT SAYING THAT HE HAD SEEN NUMEROUS 1999 MODELS WITH THIS PROBLEM AND REFERRED ME TO THE DEALER. CAR WAS OUT OF WARRANTY; DEALER SERVICE DEPT INDICATED THE PROBLEM WASN'T WIDE-SPREAD. 1,1000 TO FIX. *JB
